name: DeleteBookingCustomAttribute
description:
Deletes a custom attribute from a booking.

Use this tool to remove a custom attribute from a specific booking. Appropriate OAuth permissions are required: 'APPOINTMENTS_WRITE' for buyer-level and 'APPOINTMENTS_ALL_WRITE' with 'APPOINTMENTS_WRITE' for seller-level. Seller must be subscribed to Appointments Plus or Premium.

parameters.name: booking_id
parameters.description: The ID of the target booking from which the custom attribute will be deleted.

parameters.name: custom_attribute_key
parameters.description: The key of the custom attribute to delete. It must match the key of a custom attribute definition in the Square seller account. Use the qualified key if not the definition owner.

value_schema.description:
The key of the custom attribute to delete. This key must match the `key` of a custom
attribute definition in the Square seller account. If the requesting application is not the
definition owner, you must use the qualified key.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description:
The key of the custom attribute to delete. This key must match the `key` of a custom
attribute definition in the Square seller account. If the requesting application is not the
definition owner, you must use the qualified key.

value_schema.description:
The key of the custom attribute to delete. This key must match the `key` of a custom
attribute definition in the Square seller account. If the requesting application is not the
definition owner, you must use the qualified key.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
